articles.description: With a chance to stay in the winner's bracket on the line, the Wolfpack and Gamecocks head into Saturday night with plenty of pitching and bats for a huge showdown in the Columbia Regional.
articles.content: COLUMBIA, S.C. -- NC State baseball came up short in a gut-wrenching 6-3 loss to South Carolina on Saturday. The Gamecocks blew the game open with a four-spot in the fifth, and the Wolfpack never rec… [+3545 chars]

articles.author: Howard Fendrich
articles.title: Elena Rybakina, reigning Wimbledon champion, pulls out of French Open because she is sick - The Associated Press
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — Reigning Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina  pulled out of the French Open before her third-round match on Saturday because she is sick.
articles.content:
PARIS (AP) Reigning Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina pulled out of the French Open before her third-round match on Saturday because she is sick.

articles.title: Gunnar blasts clutch homer, bullpen hangs on as Orioles nip Giants, 3-2 - Camden Chat
articles.description: The Orioles got back on the winning track with a tense, one-run victory in the series opener in San Francisco.
articles.content:
Weve had plenty of reasons to enjoy watching Orioles baseball this season. But I especially want to thank them on this night.
